docket_entries.description: Adversary case 09-01397. Complaint by Tanner's Cafe, Inc. against City of Peabody, Alcohol Beverage Control Commission. Fee Amount of $250 is Deferred. Receipt Number Deferred. Nature of Suit(72 (Injunctive relief - other))(Weinberg, Herbert) (Entered: 12/23/2009)

Motion filed by Plaintiff Tanner's Cafe, Inc. For Expedited Determination (Re: 1 Complaint) with certificate of service filed by Plaintiff Tanner's Cafe, Inc. (Weinberg, Herbert) (Entered: 12/23/2009)

Order Dated 12/24/09 Re: 2 Motion filed by Plaintiff Tanner's Cafe, Inc. For Expedited Determination (Re: 1 Complaint). #2, THE COURT SHALL CONDUCT A HEARING ON THE MOTION FOR PRELIMINARY INJUNCTION ON 12/30/09 AT 10:00AM. DEBTOR'S COUNSEL SHALL GIVE IMMEDIATE TELEPHONIC AND ELECTRONIC NOTICE OF THE HEARING DATE TO COUNSEL FOR THE DEFENDANTS, INCLUDING CITY COUNSEL FOR THE CITY OF PEABODY, AS WELL AS COUNSEL FOR BURTON'S GRILL. (Creyes, Usbc) (Entered: 12/24/2009)
Hearing scheduled for 12/30/2009 at 10:00 AM Boston Courtroom 1, 12th Floor, 5 Post Office Square, Boston, MA 02109 Re: 1 Complaint-Injunctive relief. (Creyes, Usbc) (Entered: 12/24/2009)

BNC Certificate of Mailing - PDF Document. RE: 3 Order on Motion for Emergency/Expedited Determination Service Date 12/26/2009. (Admin.) (Entered: 12/27/2009)

Order Dated 12/30/2009 RE: 1 Complaint by Tanner's Cafe, Inc. against City of Peabody, Alcohol Beverage Control Commission. #1 CONTINUED TO FEB. 17, 2010 AT 11:00AM. THE PARTIES FILED A STIPULATION IN OPEN COURT. (cpd, USBC) (Entered: 12/30/2009)

Hearing Continued for 2/17/2010 at 11:00 AM Boston Courtroom 1, 12th Floor, 5 Post Office Square, Boston, MA 02109 RE: 1 Complaint by Tanner's Cafe, Inc. against City of Peabody, Alcohol Beverage Control Commission. (cpd, USBC) (Entered: 12/30/2009)
